name: Don't Let YoursELF Be Stopped
description:
Hello all and welcome to our very own game coming from a team of 5 sophomores: Don't Let YoursELF Be Stopped! We developed this in 48 hours during the Gamejam organised by the Academy Club. Being qualified for the second phase of the jam with our previous game (that can be found in my previous post) we knew that stakes are up and we had to deliver something bigger, better and bolder. AND THEN WE DID JUST THAT!

We are proud to announce that our efforts were not gone unnoticed and we've managed to score the Jury Special Award.

We are incredibly humbled to seen worthy of such an endearing honour and would like to thank Atıl Samancıoğlu, Mevlut Dinc (aka Mev Dinc), Reha Caputcu and the rest of the Academy Club team.

It goes without saying we're grateful of all the artists pouring their hearts out by sharing sprites and sound effects for no cost at all, you all are truly blessed.
